Title: Voices Carry
Plot: Gary Navarro, a minor league baseball player back after a 30-year absence, finds that hearing everyone's unspoken thoughts is driving him to the edge of madness. When he seeks help from NTAC, the higher-ups are more interested in how he can unearth information about Jordan Collier than how they can assist Gary with getting his life back. As the case occupies the majority of his time, Tom finds himself struggling with his responsibilities as a single father. Meanwhile, Kyle starts to get his life
GuestStars: Lexa Doig,  Candus Churchill,  Stephen McHattie,  Sharif Atkins,  Parker  Holdsworth,  Jennifer Gibson,  Robert Seckler,  Richard  De Kler,  Darren E. Scott,  Doug Abrahams,  John Dadey,  P.J. Prinsloo,  Woody J
